title: Optimizing string and regular expression (regex) search performance
description: Prefer simple string searches or prefix searches instead of complex regex when possible. Apply filters early and avoid leading wildcards to keep queries fast.

examples.name: Example
examples.description: Uses simple wildcard matching on CommandLine instead of a full regex, reducing CPU overhead for large datasets.

| CommandLine=*powershell* and CommandLine="* -enc *"
